projects.title: Beedwala - Mobile App (React Native with Express.js and MongoDB)
projects.about: The Beedwala app is a mobile platform built using React Native with a backend powered by Express.js and a MongoDB database. The app serves as an online marketplace for beekeepers to buy and sell honey, beekeeping supplies, and other related products.
key_features: Product Listing: The app displays products related to beekeeping, including honey, equipment, and supplies.
Cart and Checkout: Users can add items to the cart and proceed with secure checkout using the payment gateway integrated into the backend.
User Authentication: The app allows users to sign up, log in, and access their orders and personal information securely.
Order Tracking: Beekeepers can track their orders and see their delivery status in real-time.
projects.outcome: The Beedwala app enables beekeepers to easily buy and sell products while providing a simple and intuitive shopping experience.

projects.title: EzzyClick LLC - Clothing Mobile App (React Native)
projects.about: Developed a mobile app for EzzyClick LLC using React Native, offering a seamless shopping experience for customers in categories like kids, men, and women.
key_features: Multi-category Shopping: Offers clothing options for kids, men, and women.
Product Search and Filters: Customers can easily search for items and filter them based on size, color, and more.
Cart and Checkout: Users can add items to the cart and complete the checkout process.
User Authentication: Supports user authentication for personalized shopping.
projects.outcome: The app provides a comprehensive clothing shopping experience with smooth navigation and a responsive design.

projects.title: ooDzee - Food Order and Delivery App
projects.about: A UI-focused food order and delivery app designed with React Native, featuring Google Maps integration for restaurant locations. The app currently lacks live API integration but is built for future scalability.
key_features: Google Maps Integration: Users can explore restaurant locations and delivery zones visually.
UI/UX Design: Focus on elegant and responsive design for smooth navigation.
Mobile Responsiveness: Ensures a seamless experience on various device sizes.
projects.outcome: ooDzee provides a simple, engaging UI for food ordering with Google Maps integration, laying the foundation for future enhancements.

projects.title: Heritage Food
projects.about: A restaurant app built with React for browsing authentic Indian food and booking reservations or takeaway orders. The app integrates Stripe for payments.
key_features: Reservation System: Users can book tables for dine-in or opt for takeaway.
Takeaway Ordering: Convenient ordering system for on-the-go customers.
Payment Integration: Stripe used for seamless online payment.
projects.outcome: Heritage Food successfully combines technology with traditional cuisine, providing a seamless customer experience for reservations and takeaway.

projects.title: Comfy House - Furniture Selling App
projects.about: A simple furniture-selling app built with Vanilla JavaScript, offering users a clean UI to browse and purchase furniture online.
key_features: Product Listing: Users can view various furniture items and add them to the cart.
Checkout Process: Users can complete purchases through a simple form-based system.
Mobile Responsiveness: Ensures smooth experience on both desktop and mobile devices.
projects.outcome: Comfy House showcases the power of Vanilla JavaScript for building lightweight, responsive applications.

projects.title: Word Beater Game
projects.about: A fun word-typing game built with Vanilla JavaScript, where players type scrolling words while tracking speed and accuracy.
key_features: Game Logic: Tracks typing speed and accuracy while words scroll.
Graphical Representation: Displays words per minute (WPM) performance.
Mobile Responsiveness: Works seamlessly on both desktop and mobile.
projects.outcome: Word Beater enhances typing speed and accuracy while providing an interactive gaming experience.

projects.title: Lyrics Finder - Lyrics Search App
projects.about: A lyrics search app built with Babel and JavaScript, allowing users to find song lyrics through a simple search bar.
key_features: API Integration: Fetches lyrics from a public API based on search queries.
Search Functionality: Users can search for lyrics by song title or artist.
User-friendly UI: Minimal and efficient design.
projects.outcome: Lyrics Finder provides a simple, efficient solution for users to search for song lyrics online.
